name: Bob Leinonen
text: Love Howies! Used to go to them in Florida all the time and found this one in South Bend! Great food, good prices and the guys were really nice.

name: Chuq Jackels
text: Good pizza

name: Amy Deranek
text: I absolutely love the Turkey club sub and the chicken caesar salad is incredible!!!

name: Jim Rockford
text: Howie's pizza is way better than Dominos. I like the saucy moist pizza that Howies serves and not something that is overcooked and dry like jerky. The subs are amazing here too.

name: Tyler Platts
text: Fast hot and cooked how I requested. Tastes great!!!

name: Renee Barton
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible Howie's should be its name.  Where to start, the pizza was not cut completely through. The sauce was very spicy and the amount if grease on it would constitute an oil spill in most states. …More

name: Gail Comegysgco
text: The pizzas are great, the wings are fantastic and the people who work at the store nearest to me are always so friendly, kind and polite.  That means so much and is rare these days!

name: Ryan Konrath
text: Delicious pizza! I love the flavored crusts!

name: Terry Summers
text: Excellent hot sandwich

name: Treyvez Russell
text: This was my first time here, wait time was short, the guy at the register was nice. The pizza was about average and pretty greecy. It can most closly be compared to little Caesars but it's was double the price and I think theirs is better, …More

name: Jennifer Vick
text: Best steak and cheese sub I have had in a long time. I ordered extra meat and extra cheese and I actually got it. It wasn’t over cooked. It was perfect. As well as the friendly service that I got. I just want to say thank you.

name: Ashley Nichols
text: I love ordering here . Never had delivery but carryout never had a problem. Ordered last night for dinner . Hot, fresh an done in 15 min it was so good kids enjoyed it as always .

name: mothman
text: I ordered online & had it delivered. It was very delicious & exactly what I ordered! The delivery woman was very nice. It is now my go to pizza place! Delivery was very quick too... I was expecting it to take about 40 minutes but it only took about 15-20 minutes after I placed the order! Thank you!

name: Dan Jackson
text: Good pizza and wings. Staff is always nice. The Howie Track feature on their mobile app lets you know what stage your order is at which is super helpful. You know when its time to slide in and pick up your order. If it gave a count down in minutes, it would really rock. Maybe work on that for us Howie? ;)

name: Alan OBlenis
text: Good pizza

name: John Carter
text: I don't remember being here but love the name and will go to Hungry Howie's Pizza next time I can :)

name: Jason Barden
text: Love their stuffed crust and regular crust pizzas.  Their Howie bread falls off fairly quickly if it's not warm and their deep dish is better than regular Howie bread.

name: Gail Douglas
text: The BEST I've have so far!

name: Mary Pottenger
text: I love hungry Howie's! They are always on time, whether you order pick up or delivery. Everyone is always polite. One time one of the delivery guys gave me a tip on what coupons to us to get an even cheaper pizza! Their app is also fantastic and makes it easy to order and earn free pizza. And the pizza is delicious of course!

name: Chris Aviles
text: Pretty tasty pizza with flavored crusts that help make it a little extra enjoyable

name: Michele Kurek
text: Love the pizza. So much toppings and fresh! The bread is of equal standards! My new fav place to eat.

name: James TheBoogieMan
text: Good pizza

name: Crazy Klown
text: Great pizza for the price

name: David Phillips
text: Always good bread. Edit: In reply to Howard the reason for 4 Instead of 5 stars is the mobile site deals page is a bit of a hassle to get through and some deals are not clear on what they are. It's a minor issue at the most.

name: Archivist Sethia
text: This place is always, always on point. No matter when I call, I'm always greeted with excellent customer service. They have gotten my order wrong twice for black olives on a salad - I am easily classified as a demon customer for how angry I …More

name: Happy Camper
text: Great variety of crusts and really friendly employees! I've loved them since living in Michigan. Alas, none are located in the Indianapolis area. Good, no, great pizza at a truly affordable price. "Howie" I'll miss the -- let me count the ways. ...ha ha!

name: Joe Laskowski
text: Not the best quality pizza in town but it's good and they always have great specials. Fast and friendly service!

name: Jim Hurst
text: The Ireland Road location staff are super. Pizza and sammiches are great too. They stay open late... Hadda edit.

name: Eastlund Wendell
text: Good food, good staff

name: Matthew Bernard
text: The pizza here is pretty good. the cheese has this very satisfying gooeyness to it, especially if you opt for extra. You can also get a variety of flavored crusts which is cool. My ex wife loves this place, but we wouldn't get it all that …More

name: Matthew Perciful
text: Best pizza hands down

name: Amy Barker
text: Always quick and tastes good

name: Robby Kline
text: Great people and clean facilities

name: Laureen Johnson
text: Love their pizza with a great variety of flavored crusts.  The deep dish is my favorite!

name: Jessica Scholl
text: Love this place its amazing

name: Austin Conrad
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE: Called in an order during a busy hour last Saturday - they told me it would take 20 minutes for the 3 pizzas and Howie bread. Showed up after 20 minutes and the order wasn't ready (they had an issue with one of the …More

name: carmen geist
text: Great pizza,great price,fast friendly service

name: Erik n Jen Powers
text: They have the best Hawaiian pizza

name: Liz Wilson
text: I would love to be able to rate the food. But after 30 minutes of trying to get the website to cooperate to order it then tells me the store is closed when google says it’s open for another hour.

name: jake ols
text: Very quick service, better than little ceazers or papa johns

name: Ethan Fletcher
text: I like how quickly they get the pizza ready for me to pick up. They are always friendly here. A great variety of crusts and flavors available as well as some cool topping choices.

name: Michelle Kimmel
text: Excellent customer service and the best pizza around!

name: Roberta Ritschard
text: Their deep dish pizza is wonderful.

name: Steve Harmon
text: Great pizza and good prices

name: Justin Klingerman
text: Great service and wonderful times for delivery

name: Andy
text: Good pizza for the price

name: Patricia French
text: It was my first and last time ordering from this place. My daughter and I got food poisoning two days ago from this food and ended up in the ER. I know it was from Hungry Howie's because we ate nothing else. If it had a zero rating that's what this would be.

name: taseanta Lane
text: Forgot my sub sauce

name: James Bauer
text: Thanks for delivering to the truck drivers. And the food is amazing. Being from out of state it's a relief to have good food delivered right to the semi door.

name: Jayme Mitchell
text: Awesome, fast food style pizza

name: J Edgington
text: One of a kind...best subs and pizza

name: Charlie Mittens
text: Fast, friendly, accurate, and reasonably priced. Most importantly, tasty.

name: Region Rat
text: Quality and consistent every single time!

name: ted nitz
text: Very good buy some anytime I am nere one

name: Chauvasaur
text:
Pizza is great, Asiago is great,
but I dont know how many times I have to ask for ranch when I paid for it.
I hate red sauce really only order for the asiago bread. and its only good with the damn Ranch.
so overall 2 stars

name: Aaron Bowen
text: Good food.  Quick service.

name: Sielanah's Journey
text: This was my first time experiencing the WONDERFUL and FRESH flavor of their DELICIOUS calzone sandwich. Nothing short of AMAZING!

name: Keshia Echols
text: Good for a quick bite of pizza even if you don't want a whole one.

name: Michelle Minisan
text: Whenever we have ordered from here we have received great service and hot, deliocus, tasty pizza!!

name: Octavia Lee
text: Made an order online. really had my mouth set on it and excited that I had every topping I wanted for a coupon deal. Got a call from them 15 minutes later telling me they won't deliver to my apartment complex. Not because of distant but because of not meeting the apartment managers. I am upset and I've never heard of this before.

name: Pam Robinson
text: The app placed my order at the Hungry Howie's in Valparaiso when I was on the North side of South Bend and driving home to the South side of Mishawaka. I got to the South Bend Store to pick up my order only to find it was sent to the wrong …More

name: Stacy Beard
text: I'm not from around here but brought my son and friends to indoor skate park. When I went to order food the girl became at hungry Howie's talked to me in a snob way cuz I didn't know the address off hand and she had NO PATIENT for me. Thank u but no thank u!!!!! How rude

name: Tamara Pope
text: It's hard to find good customer service & the people there were great.

name: Katie Helgesen
text: I love Hungry Howie's especially the asiago cheese crust. I wish there was a HH near me in northwest Indiana!

name: Cathy Kraft
text: The crust is flavorful and awesome

name: Megan Treber
text: Chicken bacon ranch all im sayin!

name: Stephanie Aalfs
text: Hungry Howie's has the best calzones on earth :) couldn't ask for a more gooey more cheesy calzone!! Oh and great price.!

name: Alfonso Jael Rodriguez
text: The best pizza when it comes to crust

name: Bryant Hill
text: Extra food good prices fresh ingredients

name: William Massey
text: FAR FROM HOME, BUT VERY GOOD PIZZA FOR SOME HUNGRY TRAVELERS.

name: Angel Encarnacion
text: Good service. Great price.

name: Kristin Harris
text: Staff is always friendly food is always good

name: Robert Fidler

name: Christopher Olvitt

text: All I Can Say OMG! love the calzones <sanwhiches Pizza they know what they are doing!They have there own unique flavors you can't find anywhere else!
